rule.info: Detects activity mentioned in Operation Wocao report
Falsepositives: Administrators that use checkadmin.exe tool to enumerate local administrators.

rule.field: checkadmin.exe 127.0.0.1 -all|netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name=powershell dir=in|cmd /c powershell.exe -ep bypass -file \.:\\s.ps1|/tn win32times /f|create win32times binPath=|\\c\$\\windows\\system32\\devmgr.dll| -exec bypass -enc JgAg|type \.keepass\\KeePass.config.xml|iie.exe iie.txt|reg query HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Software\.\\PuTTY\\Sessions\\
rule.info: Detects activity mentioned in Operation Wocao report
Falsepositives: Administrators that use checkadmin.exe tool to enumerate local administrators.
